{{Description|These stone spires poke out of the clouds like great pavilions. Though this place is forbidden to mortal steps, such a beauteous sight is bound to attract the eyes of those who yearn for the sky, and for those who dwell in adepti realms.|Mist-Veiled Stone Forest}}
{{Location Intro|{{Lang|'''Huaguang Stone Forest'''|zh=华光林|zh_rm=Huáguāng-lín|zh_tl=Brilliant Light Forest}}|description=<p>It is surrounded by three mountains: [[Mt. Aocang]] to the north, [[Qingyun Peak]] to the east, and [[Mt. Hulao]] to the southwest.</p><p>While there are no [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in this area, the ones on the surrounding mountains can be used to easily reach it.</p>}}
